1.0
***M.o.D.*** & see the README
http://l-i4xx.xe.cx/
2.028
Mod Requirements: - INSTALLED 1.1 PATCH - FLMM 1.44 or newer (1.5b1)
Latest cherry picks: -merged some dll files (pls report issues) -Overall Tweaking³ ^_^ -SolarArch fixes -Spinning Planets, 8472 rep, modded FLHook & updated Plugins ;)
Have Fun =) FLMM might freeze during activation, stay cool
Credits & Greetings: EVERY MP Server Team out there!!! (yep really) without them this wouldnt be possible.
FL won't die !!!!!!!!!1111 eins elf
